Ecotricity gave Queenstown man shock $4000 power bill to pay by Christmas https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ecotricity-gave-queenstown-man-shock-4000-power-bill-to-pay-by-christmas/6JTVYMBIN5BK7J4OUTRSI44KOA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ecotricity-gave-queenstown-man-shock-4000-power-bill-to-pay-by-christmas/6JTVYMBIN5BK7J4OUTRSI44KOA/ Philip ChandlerA power provider has apologised for stinging a Queenstower with a shock $4000 bill.
